title: GET_HELI_DISABLE_EXPLODE_FROM_BODY_DAMAGE
content:
0x82AFC0A3// GetHeliDisableExplodeFromBodyDamage
BOOL GET_HELI_DISABLE_EXPLODE_FROM_BODY_DAMAGE(Vehicle heli);Parameters:heli: The helicopter to checkReturns: Returns true if the helicopter is set to be protected from exploding due to minor body damage, false otherwise.This is a getter for SET_DISABLE_HELI_EXPLODE_FROM_BODY_DAMAGE
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_HELI_DISABLE_EXPLODE_FROM_BODY_DAMAGE
GetHeliDisableExplodeFromBodyDamage(vehicle)
